means: 使变得年轻，使恢复活力( rejuvenate的过去式和过去分词 )

PerfectNetExp.abs: the sun also burn off the etheric pus that accumulates in the process of ascension allowing one to feel rejuvenated .太阳也会燃烧掉在提升过程中积聚的以太脓液，让你感到精神振作。
a rejuvenated IPCC leadership could tackle the deficiencies in its review process .一个重获活力的IPCC领导层将有助于解决该机构在评估过程中的不足。
he was rejuvenated by his trip ., 旅行使他恢复了活力.
once that happens , the rejuvenated cell can develop into a full-fledged animal , genetically identical to its parent .此过程一发生，这个恢复活力的细胞就能发育成一个完全的动物，这个动物与它的亲体在遗传上就会一模一样。

list.abs: rejuvenated river 回春河rejuvenated water 再生水rejuvenation 回春酌
rejuvenated fault 复活断层rejuvenated stream 复活河rejuvenation of oil field 油田再生
rejuvenate 复壮rejuvenated fault 复活断层rejuvenated stream 复活河
rejuvenated relief 地形侵蚀回春rejuvenated river 回春河rejuvenated water 再生水

entry.tran: 使年轻;使恢复青春;使恢复活力
entry.def: If something rejuvenates you, it makes you feel or look young again.

example.ex: Shelley was advised that the Italian climate would rejuvenate him...
example.tran: 有人建议雪莱去意大利，那里的天气会使他恢复活力。

example.ex: When it was time to leave and return to civilization we both felt rejuvenated...
example.tran: 当就要离开这里返回文明世界时，我们俩都觉得恢复了活力。

entry.tran: 使（组织、制度等）恢复活力;使更有效率
entry.def: If you rejuvenate an organization or system, you make it more lively and more efficient, for example by introducing new ideas.

example.ex: The government pushed through schemes to rejuvenate the inner cities...
example.tran: 政府大力推行改造内城贫民区的计划。

example.ex: They should concentrate on rejuvenating the existing vegetation, like grass and shrubs.
example.tran: 他们应该侧重于修整现有的绿化植被，比如草和灌木。

auth_sentence.content: He felt rejuvenated, renewed, filled with energy.
auth_sentence.res_content: He felt rejuvenated, renewed, filled with energy.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He felt rejuvenated, renewed, filled with energy.

auth_sentence.content: One team looked stale while the other suddenly looked rejuvenated.
auth_sentence.res_content: One team looked stale while the other suddenly looked rejuvenated.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: One team looked stale while the other suddenly looked rejuvenated.

auth_sentence.content: Eventually the soil will have to be rejuvenated.
auth_sentence.res_content: Eventually the soil will have to be rejuvenated.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Eventually the soil will have to be rejuvenated.
